name: experiment_allowlist
doc: This event is emitted when a user is allowlisted to an experiment

fields.name: experiment_public_id
fields.doc: An externally referencable identifier for the experiment. Also known as experiment_key in experiment mart.

fields.name: parameter_name
fields.doc: The name of the parameter used for allocation. Options are: customer_public_id, device_environment_id, global_risk_public_id.

fields.name: parameter_value
fields.doc: The value of the allocation_parameter, either the customer_public_id value, the device_environment_id value, or the global_risk_public_id value.
